post.body:
I know of very, *very* few who envision themselves being single their whole lives. The ones that end up that way go SUPER crazy and you can see that in places like +Incels. I have very little sexual or romantic appetite. I've never really had crushes or envisioned myself dating or marrying, men or women, and having sex is even more uninteresting. Oddly enough I lack most sexual instincts too, like showing off status or wanting to look attractive. I've never felt protective of women. I could have an adopted kid and legit don't see the difference between that and a biological child, yet apparently that's supposed to be a big deal or something? Other people sometimes talk about their crushes and romantic dreams like it's natural for them and I'm just completely lost.

I don't feel abnormal but I learned that according to every tenant of biology I'm an absolute anomaly. And then I realized that I've never really met hardly anyone else over the age of 12 who shares my experience. Is this a defect or are other people just acting and playing some weird game?
post.body_html:

I could have an adopted kid and legit don't see the difference between that and a biological child, yet apparently that's supposed to be a big deal or something? Other people sometimes talk about their crushes and romantic dreams like it's natural for them and I'm just completely lost.

I don't feel abnormal but I learned that according to every tenant of biology I'm an absolute anomaly. And then I realized that I've never really met hardly anyone else over the age of 12 who shares my experience. Is this a defect or are other people just acting and playing some weird game?
post.title: Is it normal to be an adult male and have almost zero interest in sex?

post.body:
I don't know if you guys have a term for this, Godcel? Christcuck?

But I feel like it would be of some help to some of you if you tried to focus on meaning in your lives beyond and outside yourselves and whether or not you get laid.

I know that's a big ask because people have an inherent need for affection and closeness with others and sexual desire, and then jew media takes that and twists it into this all-consuming obsession with Getting Laid as the end-all be-all of life, and also it probably seems like a bigger deal when you've never got it.

But like... ugh I know I'm doing this badly and probably pissing off whichever of you are reading this but hopefully at least someone will take it in the well-intentioned spirit it's offered in like... getting laid isn't the best or only measure of the value of your life, even if there are A LOT of assholes who'll line up to tell you or imply to you that it is.

Maybe read the gospels and see if you find meaning there, they helped me out of a dark place, maybe they can help you.

body:
The real reason that no one wants to tell you is that males have a primal instinct to pass on their genes and have *biological* children. Therefore they value virginity in a woman because it means they can be sure their children are actually their own genes and blood. Women do not usually, as any child they have is obviously theirs, and may even see virginity in a man as a weakness and a turn-off.

There's also the fact that females are wired to like being dominated and "owned" by males, and males have a desire to control their females.

Basically sex is stupid and it's best to just ignore it.

body:
> Polygynous species are also characterized by more aggressive and violent males (to fight one another for competition), larger males than females, females that mature earlier.

Humans aren't like this as a whole species, though this does seem to be the dominant state. There are also humans that lack these traits and usually have a natural desire of monogamy along with it.

parent.body: We are a polygynous species. In the vast majority of cultures, one man has multiple women, but women only have one man. Polygynous species are also characterized by more aggressive and violent males (to fight one another for competition), larger males than females, females that mature earlier. I think Indo-European culture is one of the few indigenous cultures to have monogamy.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

post.body:
I was wondering what your thoughts are on churches that express resounding patriotism and hanging up symbols of a nation as opposed to church symbols.

This past memorial day, flags were lined in the parking lots and next to the pulpits and I just think of the misplaced expression of memorializing fallen soldiers.  It's the nation that is at fault for our young men dying. They died because of political and economic interests of our elites... led astray by the propaganda and lies by the government.  It's ironic to hold up national flags in remembrance of the fallen. It's satanic to fly a government symbol in church - especially in glory of war.

body:
> Have you seen the comments section on those videos? Admittedly I haven't looked at new ones in at least a few years, but still.

Yeah and it's mostly adults with some teenagers in the mix and only a couple kids. It's not even that bad aside from a couple of videos where they went overboard so who cares if kids watch it unless they start imitating Jeffy. Then that's the parent's responsibility not SML's.

> They already have.

Plenty are still up that they hate. I'll just list a couple of them:

* WatchRedditDie

* The_Cabal

* Drama

* Wuhan_Flu

* conspiracy

* PoliticalCompassMemes

* subredditcancer

* KotakuInAction

* worldpolitics

* unpopularopinion

You can't tell me with a straight face that reddit doesn't want to ban any of those.

post.body:
"Nintendo" (which used to like his vids) apparently sent him a Cease and Desist letter demanding he stop using Nintendo references on his channels. Well apparently using the human puppets was not enough and now he said all his channels are being taken down June 1st 2021 which is tomorrow! I wish this was a joke but it's not, here's the proof! https://www.youtube.com/sml/community

I kind of wonder whether it was actually Nintendo or if it was really someone else trying to fake excuses to wipe out all remaining channels that aren't directly under the control of Google Inc. We know YouTube hates SML's guts, and in the past 2 years especially we've seen most of the old YouTubers quit (ExplodingTNT, PinkSheep), get rebranded by YouTube Inc. (SMG4), or get demonetized or terminated for no reason, to be replaced by completely obvious plants and hired YouTubers who instantly gain massive visibility with zero effort (Dream). Google probably knows SML is the last major remnant of pre-monetization YouTube, and while he too likes big bucks he's too stubborn to bend to their wishes all the time and won't make videos just to help them make more money. Everyone else who isn't part of the marketing scheme is either dead or buried below everything else and never sees the light of day, SML being one of the last survivors from the old days and they know it's not advertiser-friendly nor good for their desire to control everything like 1984.

body:
The danger of hormone blockers is more physical and social than mental. Delaying puberty will cause someone to fall behind their peers and not be accustomed to the new setting. It will also mess up their natural processes whenever they are resumed and probably destroy their ability to have sex. Generally it's just too unsafe to "play god" and mess with something that alters the body so much when we know so little about it.

But as far as intelligence goes, children are actually far more intelligent than adults if you adjust for maturity. That doesn't mean they're superior, just that they're better at different things. Young brains are designed to absorb as much as possible as quickly as possible like a sponge. They have good imaginations, good problem-solving skills, generally more natural talents, and can learn things much more quickly. Puberty causes the entire brain to get rewired to be best at reproduction instead of the former function, especially for men (this is why non-autistic people can't remember almost anything about their childhood, because the pre and post puberty brain of the same person are basically the ship of Theseus). Of course adults do end up being smarter overall, but only because they're more experienced; if the brain kept growing the same way as it did in childhood into adulthood you'd be a savant. Most of the learning you'll do as an adult is just imitating and going through the motions until you can appear as though really understand something; but children usually learn in innovative ways and can truly understand new concepts.
body_html:
The danger of hormone blockers is more physical and social than mental. Delaying puberty will cause someone to fall behind their peers and not be accustomed to the new setting. It will also mess up their natural processes whenever they are resumed and probably destroy their ability to have sex. Generally it's just too unsafe to "play god" and mess with something that alters the body so much when we know so little about it.

But as far as intelligence goes, children are actually far more intelligent than adults if you adjust for maturity. That doesn't mean they're superior, just that they're better at different things. Young brains are designed to absorb as much as possible as quickly as possible like a sponge. They have good imaginations, good problem-solving skills, generally more natural talents, and can learn things much more quickly. Puberty causes the entire brain to get rewired to be best at reproduction instead of the former function, especially for men (this is why non-autistic people can't remember almost anything about their childhood, because the pre and post puberty brain of the same person are basically the ship of Theseus). Of course adults do end up being smarter overall, but only because they're more experienced; if the brain kept growing the same way as it did in childhood into adulthood you'd be a savant. Most of the learning you'll do as an adult is just imitating and going through the motions until you can appear as though really understand something; but children usually learn in innovative ways and can truly understand new concepts.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

post.body:
I was wondering what your thoughts are on churches that express resounding patriotism and hanging up symbols of a nation as opposed to church symbols.

This past memorial day, flags were lined in the parking lots and next to the pulpits and I just think of the misplaced expression of memorializing fallen soldiers.  It's the nation that is at fault for our young men dying. They died because of political and economic interests of our elites... led astray by the propaganda and lies by the government.  It's ironic to hold up national flags in remembrance of the fallen. It's satanic to fly a government symbol in church - especially in glory of war.
post.body_html:

But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.
guild.description_html:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God.

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.
guild.name: Christianity

post.body:
I was wondering what your thoughts are on churches that express resounding patriotism and hanging up symbols of a nation as opposed to church symbols.

This past memorial day, flags were lined in the parking lots and next to the pulpits and I just think of the misplaced expression of memorializing fallen soldiers.  It's the nation that is at fault for our young men dying. They died because of political and economic interests of our elites... led astray by the propaganda and lies by the government.  It's ironic to hold up national flags in remembrance of the fallen. It's satanic to fly a government symbol in church - especially in glory of war.
post.body_html:
I was wondering what your thoughts are on churches that express resounding patriotism and hanging up symbols of a nation as opposed to church symbols.

This past memorial day, flags were lined in the parking lots and next to the pulpits and I just think of the misplaced expression of memorializing fallen soldiers. It's the nation that is at fault for our young men dying. They died because of political and economic interests of our elites... led astray by the propaganda and lies by the government. It's ironic to hold up national flags in remembrance of the fallen. It's satanic to fly a government symbol in church - especially in glory of war.
post.title: Patriotism and the church
